title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.12 - Actual time method
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.12 - Actual time method

State Regulations

Depreciation expense based on the number of months the
assets is owned in both the year of acquisition and the last year of an asset's
life, as opposed to using a half year's depreciation in the year of acquisition
and zero in the last year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
